verses.verse: Give ear<WH238> to my words<WH561>, O Lord<WH3068>, consider<WH995> my meditation<WH1901>.
Listen<WH7181> unto the voice<WH6963> of my cry<WH7773>, my King<WH4428>, and my God<WH430>: for unto you will I pray<WH6419>.
My voice<WH6963> shall you hear<WH8085> in the morning<WH1242>, O Lord<WH3068>; in the morning<WH1242> will I direct<WH6186> my prayer unto you<WH6822>, and will look up.
For you are not a God<WH410> that has pleasure<WH2655> in wickedness<WH7562>: neither shall evil<WH7451> live with you<WH1481>.
The foolish<WH1984> shall not stand<WH3320> in your sight<WH5869>: you hate<WH8130> all workers<WH6466> of iniquity<WH205>.
You shall destroy<WH6> them that speak<WH1696> falsehood<WH3577>: the Lord<WH3068> will abhor<WH8581> the bloody<WH1818> and deceitful<WH4820> man<WH376>.
But as for me<WH935>, I will come into your house<WH1004> in the multitude<WH7230> of your mercy<WH2617>: and in your fear<WH3374> will I worship<WH7812> toward your holy<WH6944> temple<WH1964>.
Lead<WH5148> me<WH3068>, O Lord, in your righteousness<WH6666> because of my enemies<WH8324>; make your way<WH1870> straight<WH3474> before my face<WH6440>.

For there is no faithfulness<WH3559> in their mouth<WH6310>; their inward<WH7130> part is very wickedness<WH1942>; their throat<WH1627> is an open<WH6605> tomb<WH6913>; they flatter<WH2505> with their tongue<WH3956>.

Destroy<WH816> you them<WH430>, O God; let them fall<WH5307> by their own counsels<WH4156>; cast them out<WH5080> in the multitude<WH7230> of their transgressions<WH6588>; for they have rebelled against you<WH4784>.

But let all those that put their trust<WH2620> in you rejoice<WH8055>: let them ever<WH5769> shout for joy<WH7442>, because you defend<WH5526> them<WH157>: let them also that love your name<WH8034> be joyful in you<WH5970>.
For you<WH3068>, Lord, will bless<WH1288> the righteous<WH6662>; with favor<WH7522> will you compass<WH5849> him as with a shield<WH6793>.
